description: Extension scaffolding and activation

steps.text: Run 'yo code' or manually create extension structure with package.json, tsconfig.json, and src folder
Define extension activation events in package.json (onView, workspaceContains:prd.json)
Create extension entry point that registers all commands and views
Run extension in Extension Development Host
Verify extension activates without errors in Output panel

description: PRD file detection and loading

steps.text: Open a workspace containing a prd.json file in the plans/ folder
Verify extension detects and loads the prd.json file automatically
Verify items are parsed correctly with all fields (id, category, description, steps, status, passes)
Modify prd.json externally and verify extension reloads changes
Verify error handling when prd.json is malformed

description: Sidebar tree view displays PRD items

steps.text: Open a workspace with a valid prd.json
Verify a 'Ralph' or 'PRD' view appears in the Activity Bar
Click the Activity Bar icon to open the sidebar
Verify all PRD items are listed with their descriptions
Verify items are grouped or labeled by category (setup, ui, functional, git, agent)

description: Sidebar shows status indicators for each item

steps.text: Open the sidebar with PRD items loaded
Verify each item displays a status icon (not-started, in-progress, in-review, completed)
Verify different statuses have visually distinct icons or colors
Change an item's status in prd.json manually
Verify the sidebar updates to reflect the new status

description: Detail panel opens when selecting a sidebar item

steps.text: Click on a PRD item in the sidebar
Verify a webview panel opens showing item details
Verify the panel displays: id, category, description, status, passes, and all steps
Verify each step has a checkbox showing its completion state
Click a different item in sidebar and verify panel updates

description: Drag-and-drop reordering in sidebar
steps: Open the sidebar with multiple PRD items
Drag an item from one position to another
Verify the item moves to the new position visually
Verify prd.json is updated with the new order
Reload the extension and verify order persists

description: Add new PRD item
steps: Click the 'Add Item' button in the sidebar toolbar
Verify a form/dialog appears with fields: category, description
Fill in the form and submit
Verify the new item appears in the sidebar with auto-generated ID
Verify prd.json is updated with the new item (status: not-started, passes: false, empty steps)

description: Edit existing PRD item
steps: Select an item in the sidebar
Click 'Edit' button or use context menu
Verify form/dialog opens pre-filled with current values
Modify description and category
Submit and verify changes appear in sidebar and prd.json

description: Delete PRD item
steps: Select an item in the sidebar
Click 'Delete' button or use context menu
Verify confirmation dialog appears
Confirm deletion
Verify item is removed from sidebar and prd.json

description: Add, edit, and remove steps within an item
steps: Open the detail panel for an item
Click 'Add Step' and enter step text
Verify step appears in the list
Double-click a step to edit its text
Click delete icon on a step to remove it
Verify all changes persist to prd.json

description: Toggle step completion checkboxes

steps.text: Open the detail panel for an item with steps
Click a step's checkbox to mark it complete
Verify checkbox shows checked state
Verify step completion state persists to prd.json (steps become objects with text and completed fields)
Uncheck the step and verify state updates

description: Change item status from detail panel

steps.text: Open the detail panel for an item
Locate the status dropdown/selector
Change status from 'not-started' to 'in-progress'
Verify sidebar icon updates immediately
Verify prd.json status field is updated

description: Toggle passes field from detail panel
steps: Open the detail panel for an item
Locate the 'passes' toggle/checkbox
Toggle from false to true
Verify visual indicator updates (e.g., green checkmark)
Verify prd.json passes field is updated

description: Auto-generate unique IDs for new items
steps: Create a new PRD item
Verify an ID is auto-generated in format 'category-XXX' (e.g., 'ui-005')
Create another item in the same category
Verify the new ID increments correctly
Verify no duplicate IDs exist in prd.json

description: Create feature branch when starting work on an item
steps: Select an item with status 'not-started'
Click 'Start Work' button
Verify a new git branch is created (e.g., 'feature/setup-001')
Verify the workspace switches to the new branch
Verify item status changes to 'in-progress'

description: Track changed files for in-progress item
steps: Start work on an item (creates feature branch)
Make changes to files in the workspace
Open the detail panel for the in-progress item
Verify a 'Changed Files' section shows modified files
Verify the list updates as more files are changed

description: View diff of changed file using VS Code native diff
steps: With an in-progress item that has changed files
Click on a file in the 'Changed Files' list
Verify VS Code opens the native diff view
Verify diff shows changes between feature branch and main
Verify both sides of the diff are scrollable and navigable

description: Mark item for review and show all diffs
steps: With an in-progress item that has changed files
Click 'Submit for Review' button
Verify item status changes to 'in-review'
Verify all changed files are listed in the detail panel
Verify user can click through each file to review diffs

description: Complete item and merge branch
steps: With an item in 'in-review' status
Click 'Complete' or 'Approve' button
Verify confirmation dialog shows summary of changes
Confirm completion
Verify item status changes to 'completed' and passes to true

description: Start Work triggers Copilot chat with item context
steps: Select a PRD item and click 'Start Work'
Verify GitHub Copilot Chat opens (or extension chat panel)
Verify the chat is pre-populated with context about the item
Verify context includes: description, steps, category, and relevant workspace info
Verify agent can reference the PRD item in responses

description: Agent receives project prompt template
steps: Start work on an item
Verify the agent context includes the appropriate prompt from prompts/ folder
Verify prompt is selected based on item category or project configuration
Verify agent responses align with the prompt's instructions
Test with different prompt templates (default.txt, safe-write-only.txt)

description: Agent can update step completion status
steps: Start work on an item with the agent
As agent completes implementation steps, verify it can mark steps complete
Verify step checkboxes update in the detail panel
Verify prd.json is updated with step completion
Verify user can also manually override step status

description: Agent uses skill references for context
steps: Start work on an item related to WordPress plugin development
Verify agent has access to skills/wp-plugin-development/SKILL.md
Verify agent references the skill's references/ documents when relevant
Ask agent about WordPress security best practices
Verify response incorporates content from security.md reference

description: Filter items by status in sidebar
steps: Open the sidebar with multiple items in different statuses
Click filter dropdown or toggle buttons
Select 'In Progress' filter
Verify only in-progress items are shown
Clear filter and verify all items return

description: Filter items by category in sidebar
steps: Open the sidebar with items in multiple categories
Click category filter dropdown
Select 'ui' category
Verify only UI category items are shown
Select multiple categories and verify combined results

description: Keyboard shortcuts for common actions
steps: With sidebar focused, press 'n' or configured shortcut
Verify 'Add Item' dialog opens
With item selected, press 'Enter'
Verify detail panel opens
Press 'Delete' key and verify delete confirmation appears

description: Progress summary in sidebar header
steps: Open sidebar with items in various statuses
Verify header shows progress summary (e.g., '3/10 completed')
Complete an item
Verify progress summary updates immediately
Verify progress bar or percentage indicator reflects completion
